```{r collapse=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(readxl)

set.seed(1)
```

Z scores
```{r collapse=TRUE}
x_vec = rnorm(20, mean = 10, sd = 3.5)

(x_vec - mean(x_vec)) / sd(x_vec)

```

Write a function to compute z score
```{r collapse=TRUE}
z_scores = function(x){
  if(!is.numeric(x)){
    stop("The input of x should be numeric")
  }
  if(length(x)<5){
    stop("Only compute z scores when input has 5 or more numbers")
  }
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  z
}
```

Trying function
```{r collapse=TRUE}
z_scores(x = x_vec)

num_vec = rnorm(123, mean = 14, sd = 0.4)
z_scores(x = num_vec)
```

Breaking the function
```{r error=TRUE, collapse=TRUE}
z_scores(3)
z_scores("My name is Shivalika")
```

Computing some stuff
Return mean and sd of a numeric vector
```{r collapse=TRUE}
mean_and_sd = function(x){
  
  if(!is.numeric(x)){
    stop("The input of x should be numeric")
  }
  
  if(length(x) < 5){
    stop("Only compute z scores when input has 5 or more numbers")
  }
  
  mean_x = mean(x, na.rm = TRUE)
  sd_x = sd(x, na.rm = TRUE)
  
  # c(mean_x, sd_x)
  tibble(
    mean = mean_x,
    sd = sd_x
  )
  
}

mean_and_sd(x_vec)
```
